The best hairbrush we have ever seen, we swear.
Hair care product. Definetly not the poo of a dog named Sham.
It is an okay hairbrush. Honestly, we would buy the first one.
It is just fancier shampoo; it came from a purebred, unlike Sham. Who said that? Certainly not us.
